doc:
Mary Lawrence (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Lawrence_(actress) 0 Mary Lawrence (May 17, 1918 – September 24, 1991) was an American actress, who had a lengthy career in film and television. She had a recurring role in the syndicated television series Casey Jones, which she played Casey's wife Alice Jones. Bobby Clark appeared as her son, Casey, Jr. Lawrence also appeared in episodes of The Bob Cummings Show, The Donna Reed Show, and Dragnet. After she retired from acting, she turned to writing books on art. Mary_Lawrence ( May_17_,_1918 – September_24_,_1991 ) was an_American_actress , who had a_lengthy_career in film_and_television . She had a_recurring_role in the_syndicated_television_series_Casey_Jones , which she played Casey 's_wife_Alice_Jones . Bobby_Clark appeared as her_son , Casey , Jr . Lawrence also appeared in episodes of The_Bob_Cummings_Show , The_Donna_Reed_Show , and Dragnet . After she retired from acting , she turned to writing_books on art .
